name: Very Real Chess
description: Play one of the most popular games of all time in Virtual Reality. Sharpen your skills against powerful AI, throw pieces against your opponent, or just teleport around -- all of this and more in Very Real Chess!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: AMD FX 4100 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce GTX 770 Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel® i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon™ RX 480 equivalent or greater Storage: 1 GB available space
